__TOC__



* Contact: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ehb|EliasHalldorBjarnason]]</nowiki>
* Make: Mitac
* Model: 8252D
* Website: <nowiki>[[http://www.mitac-mtc.com.tw/English/products/notebook.aspx]]</nowiki>

=== Current Issues ===
Hardy:
* X does not start correctly when the laptop is booted with battery power (unplugged).
Gutsy:
* X does not start correctly when the laptop is booted with battery power (unplugged).
* Wireless internet connection hangs sometimes for an unknown reason and after a while the computer becomes unusable requiring a reboot.
* Switching the screen from the laptop monitor to a projector (with Fn+F5) works but not back from the projector to the screen (pushing Fn+F5 again).

=== System Info ===
<pre>
system-manufacturer: Intel Corporation
system-product-name: Crestline & ICH8M Chipset
system-version: Not Applicable
</pre>

=== Hardware details ===
* Processor: Intel Core2 Duo CPU T7700 2.4GHz
* RAM: 2 x DDR2 667Mhz 1GB (total 2GB)
* Hard drive: HDD 2.5" SATA Hitachi 160GB
* Optical drive: DVD-ROM/DVD-RW/CD-RW
* Wireless LAN: Intel 802.11n MiniPCI-E
* LAN: 10/100 Mbps
* Modem: 56kbps V.90 MDC internal fax modem
* Display panel: 14.4inch TFT, resolution 1280x800 WXGA
* Video Card: nVidia Ge''''''Force 8600M GS (rev a1)
* Video controller: UMA
* Video port: DVI-I
* Audio controller: Intel 82801H (ICH8 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 3)
* Audio ports: Line-out, S/PDIF, Min-in
* Audio codec: Realtek ALC883
* Speakers: 2x1Watt stereo, center subwoofer
* Express''''''Card/54: Express''''''Card/34 and Express''''''Card/54 support
* Card Reader: SD / MS / MS Pro / MMC
* I/O Ports: Four USB ports (2.0 support), RJ-11 port, RJ-45 port
